result.execSummary:
The defendant Deandre J Wilson was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Retail Theft. This is not a criminal offense and results only in a money penalty for this offense.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

parties.name: Milwaukee County Clerk of Circuit Court

supervisions.notes:
Defendant enters a plea of no contest. Court found the Defendant guilty. Court orders Defendant to pay a forfeiture of $100.00 including costs to be paid by 04-11-16 or Civil Judgment.
Court ordered restitution set at $0 (zero).

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Deandre J Wilson

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Deandre J Wilson in court with attorney Ramon Arellano Valdez.  Brittany Skye Kachingwe appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: TC. Court found the state has satisfied victims' rights law.

On motion of the State, Court ordered charge amended to Retail Theft, contrary to County ordinance section 63.043, a Class forfeiture.
.
Defendant enters a plea of no contest. Court found the Defendant guilty. Court orders Defendant to pay a forfeiture of $100.00 including costs to be paid by 04-11-16 or Civil Judgment.
.
Court ordered restitution set at $0 (zero).

Defendant Deandre J Wilson in court with attorney Ramon Arellano Valdez.  Jennifer L Pickett appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: TC. Case calendared for projected guilty plea and sentencing/ calendar call. Court ordered stayed warrant lifted. Court is in jury trial for today's proceedings. Attorney Ramon Valdez is still awaiting a video from the State.   Court ordered case adjourned for status conference in Branch 31.   Agreed Upon Request for a New Court Date is signed and filed.  Status conference scheduled for February 10, 2016 at 08:30 am.

Attorney Ramon Arellano Valdez in court.  Kelly O'Neill appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: TC. Case calendared for projected guilty plea and sentencing. For reasons stated on the record,   Defendant failing to appear, Court ordered a bench warrant issued but stayed the issuance until next scheduled hearing.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for January 14, 2016 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Deandre J Wilson in court with attorney Ramon Arellano Valdez.  Brittany Skye Kachingwe appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: TC. Case calendared for projected guilty plea. For reasons stated on the record, defense is awaiting video from retail store. Court ordered case adjourned for projected guilty plea in Branch 31. All parties are notified that effective 12-01-15 this case will be assigned to Reserved Branch, Branch 31, in Room 615 of the Courthouse.
  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for December 14, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Deandre J Wilson in court with attorney Ramon Arellano Valdez.  Kelly O'Neill appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: TC. For reasons stated on the record, Court ordered case adjourned for projected guilty plea in Branch 37.  Plea hearing scheduled for November 16, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Deandre J Wilson in court with attorney Ramon Arellano Valdez prior to case being called.  Brittany Skye Kachingwe appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: KAR.  Case calendared for status of counsel.  Defense counsel unavailable for afternoon proceedings.  Court ordered case adjourned for status conference in Branch 37.  Agreed Upon Request for a New Court Date is signed and filed.  Status conference scheduled for October 30, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Deandre J Wilson in court with attorney Jamie Francis Cimpl-Wiemer.  Brittany Skye Kachingwe appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: KAR.  Case calendared for plea/sentencing hearing.
Defense motion to withdraw as counsel is granted by the court. Defense counsel will notify Public Defender's Office to appoint new counsel for the defendant.  Case adjourned for status of counsel in branch 37.  Status conference scheduled for October 7, 2015 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Deandre J Wilson in court with attorney Jamie Francis Cimpl-Wiemer.  Alex T. Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   ENTRY MADE WITHOUT COURT FILE. Deputy Court Clerk: TC. Case calendared for status conference. Warrant issued in error as to case passed to the afternoon. Court ordered bench warrant cancelled.   Court ordered case adjourned for projected guilty plea and sentencing in Branch 37.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for September 14, 2015 at 01:30 pm.
Signature bond ordered to be forfeited in the amount of 300.00.
COURT ORDERED DEFENDANT REMANDED TO THE COMMISSIONER ON RETURN OF THE BENCH  WARRANT.

Attorney Jamie Francis Cimpl-Wiemer in court prior to case being called.  Alex T. Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Deputy Court Clerk: TC. Case calendared for status conference. Defendant failing to appear, Court ordered Bench Warrant to be issued.  Court ordered any bail posted to be forfeited.

Defendant Deandre J Wilson in court with attorney Jamie Francis Cimpl-Wiemer as a friend of the Court.  Brittany Skye Kachingwe appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: TC.

-CASE PASSED
-CASE RECALLED AT 4:14
-SAME APPEARANCES

Defense counsel interviewed defendant and is public defender eligible.   Court ordered case adjourned for status conference in Branch 37.  Status conference scheduled for August 13, 2015 at 08:30 am.
Oral, No Contact Order.  Defendant to have no contact with Walmart.

Defendant Deandre J Wilson in court.  James C. Griffin appeared for the State of Wisconsin. 
Defendant is advised that this case is assigned to Judge Dee, Branch 37.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant received a copy of the complaint and was advised of right to counsel and maximum penalties.  Court entered a plea of not guilty on behalf of the Defendant.  Court reserves Defendant's right to file a substitution of judge pursuant to Sec. 971.20 until Defendant's next scheduled court appearance. 
Defendant was given a referral to the Public Defender's Office. Defendant MAY be Public Defender eligible. The case is adjourned for a Pretrial Conference in Br. 37.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for July 23, 2015 at 01:30 pm.
SUMMONS MAILED. DEFENDANT ORDERED INTO ROOM 221 SAFETY BUILDING ON 07-06-2015 at 01:30pm
